testcase.name: Find and book flight tickets
testcase.system-out: Given I am in the login page of the application.............................passed And I login using the valid username mercury and the valid password mercury.passed Given I search for flights using the following criteria:....................passed And I select the first available flight.....................................passed And I book the tickets using the following passenger details:...............passed And I use the following credit card details:................................passed Then I should get a booking confirmation with a confirmation number.........passed
